TheDreamer:Dream.NAME: Dream
TheDreamer:Dream.DESCRIPTION: thedreamer:Fleeting. NL thedreamer:Fantasy: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL thedreamer:Reality: Gain !B! Block.

TheDreamer:Mirage.NAME: Mirage
TheDreamer:Mirage.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block per enemy.

TheDreamer:WakeUpCall.NAME: Wake-Up Call
TheDreamer:WakeUpCall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Recall !M!. NL Does not activate thedreamer:Awakening effects.

TheDreamer:Thought.NAME: Thought
TheDreamer:Thought.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is shuffled, exhaust it.

TheDreamer:FlowOfConsciousness.NAME: Flow Of Consciousness
TheDreamer:FlowOfConsciousness.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL thedreamer:Awakening: Draw !M! cards.

TheDreamer:Image.NAME: Image
TheDreamer:Image.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL thedreamer:Awakening: Put this card into your hand.
